name: brave-search
description: Brave Search API for web source discovery, news search, and general research queries

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Search the web for sources, data, and information relevant to the research question

parameters.freshness: Filter by recency: pd (past day), pw (past week), pm (past month), py (past year)
parameters.safesearch: Safe search level: off, moderate, strict

tools.name: news_search
tools.description: Search recent news articles for current events, announcements, and market developments

parameters.freshness: Filter by recency: pd (past day), pw (past week), pm (past month)

tools.name: suggest
tools.description: Get search query suggestions for expanding research scope

parameters.query: Partial query to get suggestions for

rate_limits.note: Free tier limit. Upgrade to Pro for higher limits.

notes: Brave Search is the primary source discovery tool for the research team. It is required for all research modes. The free tier provides 2,000 queries per month, which is sufficient for 40-80 research studies depending on depth. Deep research (sources.depth: deep) may consume 30-50 queries per study.
